attributes.action: Jihadists should be stripped of Citizenship (Traitors to the Allegiance)
attributes.additional_details:
Any British Citizen, involved in Oversea's conflict, which goes against the Alligiance, should be stripped of Citizenship, and any assets sold off, bank accounts seized, to help victim's of their war crimes.
The Citizen will not become 'stateless' as they can remain in the country they are fighting for.
